other_tests.findings: Focal narrowing of a short segment of the distal thoracic esophagus, with delayed passage of contrast material beyond this narrowing and intraesophageal reflux observed proximal to the narrowing.
Encountered a stenosis 18 cm from the incisors, with normal mucosa in this area; dilation attempted with an 8-mm balloon resulted in mild improvement in the stricture without mucosal disruption.
Marked circumferential thickening of the wall with luminal narrowing and effacement of normal architecture of submucosa and muscularis mucosae, with evidence of disorganization and fibrosis.
